All Classes

Class Description
ArrayFinderManager
Abstract class as an interface for finder functionality of an array.
Board
Store the dimension of the Game Play Area.
BoardArrayManager
Abstract class as an interface.
Button
Set the button infomation.
ControlScreen
Store and setup control screen.
DrawDead
To Draw the object that does not move in the game.
DrawDead.CellType  
DrawLive
Draw the moving object in the game.
DrawLive.CellType
There are two moving object in the game: player and enemies.
EndScreen
Store the End Game Screen (show up when game over).
Enemy
Represents the enemy that chases the player in the game.
EnemyArray
Implements the interface of ArrayFinderManager (Enemy Objects).
Exit
Represent the Exit Door in the game.
GameScreen
Storing the information when the program.
HelpScreen  
Interface
store the screen the the game will show depend on the situation.
LevelGenerator
Level Generator is a class that uses Depth-first search algorithm to auto generate a maze.
LevelGenerator.Difficulty
Choose the difficult.
LocationRandomizerGenerator
Extension of BoardArrayManager : Add additional randomizing location functionality for objects.
Main  
Misc
Storing The misc info of the game.
Music
Store the details of the background Music
NewFont
Store the info of new font.
NextScreen
Storing the nextScreen Info.
PauseScreen
Setup for pauseScreen
Player
Represent the main character of the game.
PlayerFinder
Find the nearest path from the initial position to player position in the board using Breadth First Search
Reward
Abstract class for the rewards in the game play area.
RewardArray
Implements the interface of ArrayFinderManager (Rewards Objects).
RewardTypeA
Represents a specific kind of rewards (Keys) in the game.
RewardTypeB
Represents a specific kind of rewards (Coins) in the game.
Score
Keep Track of Player's Score Throughout the Game Session.
SkinScreen
storing the skin screen info.
Sprite
Store sprite image of the game.
Timer
Manages the game timer.
TitleScreen
Show the information of the title Screen.
Trap
Abstract class for the traps in the game play area.
TrapArray
Implements the interface of ArrayFinderManager (Traps Objects).
TrapTypeA
Represents a specific kind of Traps (Spikes) in the game.
TrapTypeB
Represents a specific kind of Traps (Lava Pits) in the game.
